title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: the lightweight server & CLI that downloads, caches, and exposes GGUF models via a local REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client and asyncio bindings for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript / TypeScript client for Node & browsers (fetch-based).

title: langchain-ollama (PyPI)
summary: LangChain adapter providing Ollama LLM & embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (chat, file upload, multi-user) that proxies to a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-hass
summary: Home-Assistant custom component exposing Ollama as a conversation agent.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS-Code extension that adds local AI code completion powered by Ollama.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Interactive terminal chat wrapper with conversation persistence and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG pipeline combining Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store for local document Q&A.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java / Kotlin client library for Ollama with Spring-Starter integration.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with any Ollama model.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for running Ollama server on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language client for Ollama with async/await and native JSON parsing.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting .NET 6+ and ASP.NET Core integration.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger (CUE) module that spins up Ollama containers for CI-based LLM testing.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-model-registry
summary: Community-curated registry of GGUF models pre-converted for Ollama with hashes.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: Cross-platform desktop app (Tauri) combining Ollama backend with GPT4All-style UI.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Subreddit for announcements, troubleshooting and showcase of Ollama projects.

title: ollama-hackernews-discussion
summary: Hacker News thread discussing the release of Ollama v0.1.30 with multi-modal support.
